person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: FEATURE - Singapore sees prestige in hosting WTO .

Let's think step by step.

1. Singapore
2. WTO (World Trade Organization)

In this paragraph, "Singapore" is the person entity as it is the one hosting the WTO and experiencing the prestige associated with it.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Singapore

In this paragraph, only "Singapore" is the clearly identified person entity. The WTO is an organization and not a person.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
